name: NationTweaker
tagline: Been waiting a year for NationBuilder to fix that tiny bug that wastes your time? Wish things worked just that little bit differently in your nation? NationTweaker provides tweaks, fixes, and enhancements for the NationBuilder campaign platform.
body:
### Using
NationTweaker is currently available for the latest versions of [Google Chrome](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/nationtweaker/ijcpabbeffcdlfhgaohljahijgejljhm) and [Mozilla Firefox](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/nationtweaker/), although some tweaks may not work on both.

### Current tweaks you can use
* Enable email re-opt-in 
* Sort people tags alphabetically
* Fix attendees link on event dashboard
* Make page tags link to page tag view
* Hide social capital
* Allow removal of point person from volunteers
* Make path names on person view clickable
* Uncheck 'add to top nav' by default on new pages

More tweaks, fixes, and improvements coming soon.

### Feedback
Submit bug fixes, comments, and feature requests direct to the GitHub project, or [direct via this form](https://goo.gl/forms/bMUQLSZA4HU3LBGa2).

### Contributing
NationTweaker was created and is maintained by @ineffyble. All devs are encourages to submit pull requests and contribute to the development of this plugin.

You can also make a monetary contribution [via PayPal](https://paypal.me/ineffyble) and support the project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
